job.title: Principal Software Engineer - Sensors / Government / Aerospace
job.description: We are a rapidly growing company that provides services to the aerospace and defense industry related to sensors amp electrooptics Weve been in business for over 15 years and as we grow our team we are looking for passionate people who want to build longterm careers with usbrbrWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive compensation contingent on experiencelili Medical Dental Vision Insurance 100 coveredlili 401k 6 matchlili PTO  20 dayslili Bonus potentiallili Opportunity to work on challenging projects with a brightpassionate teambrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Experience as Senior Principal or Lead Software Engineerlili Experience with Python or one of the following C PHP NET or Javalili Ability to obtain government clearancelili Previous experience with DoD IC government aerospace or finance industry Pluslili Experience solving difficult problems and open to new challenges While this sounds clich we really need someone who wants to be challenged and has a good problemsolving track recordlili Experience with AWS Pluslili Experience with Git Pluslili Experience using SQL NoSQL PostgreSQL SQLite etc Pluslili Familiar and comfortable with Agile Development Processes PlusbrliulWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Manage the continuous improvement process within our software products lifecyclelili Liaise synchronize and work in conjunction with our other software teamslili Ensure that software products are adequately documented to a level to maintain the package and require that adequate backups of each version of the software for all projects are maintained in an ordered and complete fashionlili Offer technical support where needed developing software for our backend systemslili Stay current with industry trends and source new ways for our business to improvelili Communicate effectively with project management customers and team members across disciplineslili Attend technical interchange meetings with the team members and other project personnel and represent the organization in matters pertaining to the development of hisher project Provide status on assigned tasks and program scheduleslili Provide document review and resolve technical engineering and integration issuesbrliulSo if you are a Principal Software Engineer with the experience above please apply today or email me directly at edwinocampocybercoderscombrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best application to be consideredbrliulEdwin Ocampo  Recruiting Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity
